resources.string: You really suck at this game.
Could not return results. The API doesn\'t have enough questions for your query.
Contains an invalid parameter. Arguments passed in aren\'t valid.
Session Token has returned all possible questions for the specified query. Resetting the Token is necessary.

This application is a general culture quiz using Open Trivia Database API (https://opentdb.com). Therefore, you can have access to 3,559 verified questions and 3,291 pending questions, divided into 24 categories.\n\nThis application is an open source project, and all source code is available at this address: https://github.com/AlexandreLadriere/Android_The-general-culture-quiz.
